io.hekate.messaging.broadcast

Class BroadcastFuture<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Base type of a broadcast message.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompletionStage<BroadcastResult<T>>, Future<BroadcastResult<T>>

    public class BroadcastFuture<T>
extends MessagingFuture<BroadcastResult<T>>
    Asynchronous result of broadcast(...) operation.
